Articles.Content:
Hello all,

This week I decided to make an actual plane that caught my interest from another forum that I am on. This is a Mig-25 using all stock parts and no part clipping enabled in the parts editor.

Specs

900kn of brute force

1050m/s at 15000ms

18000m max ceiling

The same fuel mileage as a 1969 Cadillac!!!!!!

This is a fun and challenging plane to fly, it is not the most acrobatic plane ever made but I do not believe that the real plane was either. The plane is not using a ton of intake either just 4 and 2 of those were meant for just aesthetics really and are facing the wrong way.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1r4a6y0z5e99c4w/mig25.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I hope everyone enjoys and I hope to hear some feedback
Looks really nice but Turbojets have a max Thrust of 225 KN. So How do you get 900 without Clipping?

Looks really nice but Turbojets have a max Thrust of 225 KN. So How do you get 900 without Clipping?

You can put a cube inside of the engine without parts clipping on and plan another engine behind it.

I like this plane.

Is 1050 m/s the max speed?

I like this plane.

Is 1050 m/s the max speed?

You could add another intake or 2 to get some more altitude and I am sure it would go about 1500 or so, holding at 18000m though it seems like it is it.
Bumpig this, hoping to see if anyon has used it and has any ideas i can use to make it better
